practiceAreas: Real Estate Law|Business Law|Construction Law|Personal Injury|Medical Malpractice|Family Law
description:
Here at the Degnan Law Group in Phoenix, Arizona, we offer a full range of quality, professional legal services to help you with all of the important and pressing issues affecting your life and family, your business, and your future. Serving a diverse range of clients throughout Maricopa County and across the state, our law firm's team of top-rated, award-winning attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently.

We promise to do all we can to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you expect and deserve for your legal challenges involving any of the following practice areas:

·Business law

·Construction law

·Family law and divorce

·HOA law

·Personal injury

·Real estate law

As entrepreneurs ourselves, we understand the issues so many business owners face when trying to establish and run their commercial enterprises. We also understand the challenge of maintaining a sustainable business in today's dynamic market, and we will arm you with the tools you need to help make your company a success.

If you are going through a divorce or if you suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can rely on us for compassionate counsel and aggressive advocacy at all turns to improve the likelihood you will achieve the positive results you seek. During our time in practice, we have assisted hundreds of clients with making their lives whole again following a traumatic event.

As leaders in our practice areas, we have published articles and conducted lectures and seminars on a variety of legal topics so you can trust you will receive the highest level of counsel possible. Honored for our outstanding professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, and our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To find out more about how we can best assist you with your legal matter, you can contact the Degnan Law Group by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation.
